授業目的:
To develop students' critical understanding on urban development in a globalizing World, with research seminar mode of learning,
so that they can make good analysis om urban development policy and issues, as well as scenario planning for the future.

到達目標:
Students' critical learning of new development issues in global and local developments
- they can use different methods of urban analyses to make critical assessment on development policy and issues: Good Case Studies & Presentation
授業方法:
Lecture by Teacher, Presentation by Students, Small Group Discussions & Debate. ON DEMAND E-Learning at LUNA
